Basic, Italian food. Pasta and pizza. Well prepared but not outstanding. It's a nice break from tapas. Service is ... informal. Friendly enough but little concern for bringing entrees out in the same time fame. Coffee came 15 minutes after dessert. My wife noted that it suffered from Italian male hospitality. (We are of Italian descent.)  Boisterous but a bit unprofessional. I see too many four stars on Yelp. To me , three stars mean perfectly acceptable but with room for improvement.
